description: This file appears to be a build recipe or configuration script for building a Go language target within a Yocto/OpenEmbedded build system. It contains dependency declarations, environment variable setups, build and install functions, and package definitions, indicating its role in build orchestration rather than source code for a typical programming language.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Compiles the Go source code by setting environment variables and executing the build script.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Installs the built Go binaries and source files into the staging directory, sets up necessary links, and cleans up test data.
